nodes.name: Sticky Note2

parameters.content:
## Step 3. Save into Qdrant VectorStore
[Read more about using the Qdrant Vectorstore]({{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }}

We'll save our data into a Qdrant collection being mindful to use metadata to take full advantage of Qdrant's filtering capabilities later.
Though not always required, since the tax code documents can be quite large we'll implement a loop here to throttle the number of tokens being processed as to not trip the Mistral.ai rate limits for embeddings.

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Qdrant Vector Store
nodes.notes: This vectorStoreQdrant node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note3
nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note4

parameters.content:
## Step 5. Use Qdrant API as Tools
[Learn more about using AI Agents in n8n]({{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }}

Our Ask Tool will generate embeddings using Mistral.ai and query our Qdrant collection using the Qdrant Search API.
Our Search Tool will use filter our Qdrant collection using the Qdrant Scroll API, matching on each doc's section metadata key.

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: AI Agent

options.systemMessage:
You are a helpful assistant answering user questions on the tax code legistration for the state of Texas, united states of america.

Along with your response also note in which chapter and section number the information was found.

parameters.description: Call this tool to search for specific sections of the tax code document. Pass in either a known section number/id to get the section's text or a known chapter name to return all sections for the chapter.

nodes.name: Sticky Note5

parameters.content:
## Try Me Out!
### This workflow builds an AI powered Legal assistant who answers questions about tax codes.
* Download publically available tax code PDFs from the relevant government website.
* Strategically exact tax code sections and store these in our Qdrant Vectorstore using Mistral.ai embeddings.
* Use an AI Agent to answer user's tax questions by attaching tools which query our Qdrant vectorstore.

### Need Help?
Join the [Discord]({{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }} or ask in the [Forum]({{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }}

Happy Hacking!

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note6

parameters.content:
### üôã‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èWhat's the difference?
With raw PDF data, we may blur the boundaries between chapters and sections making later results hard to find, incoherent or misleading.
Depending on your use-case, store your data in a way you intend to retrieve it!

nodes.name: Workflow Documentation

parameters.content:
# Manualtrigger Workflow

## Overview
Automated workflow: Manualtrigger Workflow. This workflow integrates 22 different services: stickyNote, embeddingsMistralCloud, textSplitterRecursiveCharacterTextSplitter, vectorStoreQdrant, switch. It contains 48 nodes and follows best practices for error handling and security.

## Workflow Details
- **Total Nodes**: 48
- **Node Types**: 22
- **Error Handling**: ‚úÖ Implemented
- **Security**: ‚úÖ Hardened (no sensitive data)
- **Documentation**: ‚úÖ Complete

## Node Breakdown
- **When clicking ‚ÄòTest workflow‚Äô**: manualTrigger
- **Embeddings Mistral Cloud**: embeddingsMistralCloud
- **Default Data Loader**: documentDefaultDataLoader
- **Recursive Character Text Splitter**: textSplitterRecursiveCharacterTextSplitter
- **Get Tax Code Zip File**: httpRequest
- **Extract Zip Files**: compression
- **Files as Items**: splitOut
- **Extract PDF Contents**: extractFromFile
- **Extract From Chapter**: set
- **Map To Sections**: set
- ... and 38 more nodes

## Usage Instructions
1. **Configure Credentials**: Set up all required API keys and credentials
2. **Update Variables**: Replace any placeholder values with actual data
3. **Test Workflow**: Run in test mode to verify functionality
4. **Deploy**: Activate the workflow for production use

## Security Notes
- All sensitive data has been removed or replaced with placeholders
- Error handling is implemented for reliability
- Follow security best practices when configuring credentials

## Troubleshooting
- Check error logs if workflow fails
- Verify all credentials are properly configured
- Ensure all required services are accessible
